Line 30: Line 30:
You can select the desktop environment within Wubi. But, because each desktop environment is also available as an application package, it is recommended that users install Ubuntu (default option) and from there install the other desktop environments. When you [[login]], you can choose the desktop environment to use.<ref>http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php</ref>
You can select the desktop environment within Wubi. But, because each desktop environment is also available as an application package, it is recommended that users install Ubuntu (default option) and from there install the other desktop environments. When you [[login]], you can choose the desktop environment to use.<ref>http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php</ref>
  +
== Problems ==
  +
*Hibernation/suspend is not supported. <ref>http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php</ref>
  +
*Wubi filesystem is more vulnerable to hardreboots (unplugging the power) than a normal filesystem. <ref>http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php</ref>
== Influences ==
== Influences ==
It relies on other open source projects: [[Debian installer]], [[Migration-Assistant]], [[Grub4Dos]], [[NTFS-3G]], [[NSIS]] and [[Metalink]].
It relies on other open source projects: [[Debian installer]], [[Migration-Assistant]], [[Grub4Dos]], [[NTFS-3G]], [[NSIS]] and [[Metalink]].
